name: PRINCE JUNIOR V2
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot made by Junior Ezed

ALIVE_IMG.description: paste your image url if you don't have you can use this public url.

LIVE_MSG.value: > PRINCE JUNIOR V2 AM ONLINE MADE BY JUNIOR EZED ‚ö°

PREFIX.description: paste your bot prefix note! Don't apply null prefix.

MODE.description: select your bot work type public-private-inbox-group.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Make it true if want always online.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if want automatic voice reply .

AUTO_REPLY.description: Make it true if you want automatic reply.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want automatic sticker.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Make it true for automatic status seen.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Make it true for auto reply msg on status seen.

AUTO_STATUS__MSG.description: Type custom message on status reply
AUTO_STATUS__MSG.value: *üéâüëÄ JUST NOW SEEN BY PRINCE JUNIOR V2 ü§©ü•≥üòç*

OWNER_NUMBER.description: put the owner number for bot.

ANTI_LINK.description: Make it true if you want bot auto remove group link.

ANTI_BAD.description: Make it true if you want bot auto delete bad words.

DESCRIPTION.description: add caption for menu and other

DELETE_LINKS.description: remove links from group automatically without removing member

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want auto recoding.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Make it true if you want auto typing.

AUTO_REACT.description: Make it true if you want react on every message.

OWNER_REACT.description: Make it true if you only want react on Owner Massages.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Make it true if you want custom reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: put here custom react react emojis.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Make it true if you want bot read your all sms just now.

description: I don't know what I'm doing

DEV.description: Put any phone numbers you want to be bot owner without + or spaces, separated by commas. Example: 254741388986,254100156216

NOT_OWNER_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only owner user is violated. Example: Owner only

BOT_ADMIN_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires bot to be admin is violated. Example: Bot is not admin!

ADMIN_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that requires only owner user is violated. Example: Only admins are allowed to use this command
ADMIN_MSG.value: Only admins are allowed to use this command

HEROKU_API.description: Put a Heroku api key here, will be required to update vars in your Dm

BAD_WORD.description: List words separated with commas that will be considered as bad and will trigger bot to kick. Example: fuck, pussy, hoe

BAD_WORD_KICK.description: Put here TRUE if you want the bot to automatically kick group members using words that you have listed as bad

GROUP_ONLY_MSG.description: Put a message that the bot will send if a parameter that works in group chats only is violated. Example: This command will work in groups only
GROUP_ONLY_MSG.value: This command will work in groups only

AUTOREAD.description: Put here TRUE if you want bot to automatically bluetick messages in private chats

AUTOVIEW.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to automatically read status update

WA_PRESENCE.description: Input either recording, typing, online, or leave it blank. This enables bot to simulate typing or recording or online status even if you're not online.

WELCOMEGOODBYE.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to welcome new members joining group or wave goodbye to members leaving a group.

ANTILINK.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick link senders

ANTILINK_ALL.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick users sending any links.

ANTIBOT.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to kick other bots from group

CODE.description: Input you country code here without + eg 254, it Will be used to Eliminate foreigners from the group once prompted.

SESSION.description: Paste your Session id here, as it is required for authenticationn.

MODE.description: Input PRIVATE if you don't want other people to use your bot

AUTOBIO.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to autoupdate its about with current time and date.

APP_NAME.description: Input your app name that you put above, Must be in small letters.

GPT_INBOX.description: Input TRUE if you want bot to autoreply inbox messages using openai API.

MENU_TYPE.description: Input either VIDEO, LINK or IMAGE. This will allow bot to display different dynamic menu types

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: input TRUE if you want bot to autolike status updates. This will only work if autostatus view is TRUE
